alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:01PM AKST until December 08 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT FOR THE HAINES HIGHWAY WEST OF HAINES... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches through early morning. * WHERE...Haines Highway west of Haines. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snow accumulations are expected along the Haines Highway from mile marker 20 to the border. As of 145 PM Wedesday, webcam imagery and spotter reports confirm that appreciable snowfall continues to occur with around 6 inches of snow on the ground. Snowfall intensities are expected to diminish later this evening into the early morning hours Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
